{{title|deduction guides for {{tt|std::basic_regex}}}}
{{cpp/regex/basic_regex/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=regex|since=c++17|1=
template&lt; class ForwardIt &gt;
basic_regex( ForwardIt, ForwardIt,
             std::regex_constants::syntax_option_type = std::regex_constants::ECMAScript )
-&gt; basic_regex&lt;typename std::iterator_traits&lt;ForwardIt&gt;::value_type&gt;;
}}

This [[cpp/language/class template argument deduction|deduction guide]] is provided for {{lc|std::basic_regex}} to allow deduction from an iterator range.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;regex&gt;
#include &lt;vector&gt;

int main()
{
    std::vector&lt;char&gt; v = {'a', 'b', 'c'};
    std::basic_regex re(v.begin(), v.end()); // uses explicit deduction guide
}
}}
